title-group.article-title: Review of Ride Vibration Standards and Tolerance Criteria

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc., 1977

abstract.p: Ride vibration standards should be viewed positively as eliminating some of the confusion which has existed with ride measurement and analysis procedures. On the other hand current standards and criteria should not be accepted at face value yet as being measures of absolute human tolerance. This paper discusses standards and other criteria which deserve application to actual vehicle ride vibration data so that a better understanding of ride can be established in the near future.
